wheelie.name: Wheelie
wheelie.description: The command that gives you more information on commands, DO NOT put in the period before command

ballot.name: ballot
ballot.description: Shows the canidates or options for multi option voting, gives you the canidate's username to the left of the username or option

castfor.name: castfor
castfor.description: FOR CITIZENS ONLY - casts votes for a certain canidate or option [YOU NEED TO LOOK AT BALLOT BEFOREHAND]

countvotes.name: countvotes
countvotes.description: count the votes of the current issue (this is related to but not one of the election commands)

vote.name: vote
vote.description: cast a vote for the current issue (this is not castfor, please do not confuse these) takes either yay or nay as a required argument

issue.name: issue
issue.description: displays the issue for the vote command

urbandict.name: urban dictionary
urbandict.description: Ah yes, a fun one, gives you the definition for an urban dictionary term, takes the term after a slash

langhelp.name: langhelp
langhelp.description: shows the languageID for the translation command

translate.name: translate
translate.description: translate any text into a language provided by langhelp [USES A SLASH INSTEAD OF A SPACE]

alert.name: alert
alert.description: shows a list of pedos and creeps

wholikes.name: wholikes
wholikes.description: check to see who likes the bot

ilike.name: ilike
ilike.description: [LEGACY COMMAND] tell the bot you like it - you have to put your own username at the end

drinks.name: drinks
drinks.description: [LEGACY COMMAND] send the entire chat or someone specific a drink

fight.name: fight
fight.description: does some math based on the usernames provided and determines a winner based on a higher score
